titleStmt.title: Unidentified Śrauta work: Somayāga to Sarvapṛṣṭha

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This manuscript is incomplete. There is a note written mentioning as it is unidentified text. According to the note the context is Somayāga to Sarvapṛṣṭha from some Śrauta work. It needs close attention to decide which Śrauta work really it is. The note mentions the information: Śrautagranth (from Soma Sarvapṛṣṭha) Granth 252 p. 9 L. After the guard folio first blank folio has something scribbled.

msItem.title: Śrauta
msItem.incipit: [1v]1 [nibdo]masya?mukhya[ni]rūpyate . kṛt? saṃkalpa[ka?] … (rest of the folio is torned.)
msItem.explicit: [xr] 8 mahāvṛtasya hotṛmaitrāva[rūṇa] (gap of approximately 12 syllables due to broken folio.) bhyo namaḥ .. śiva?namaḥ .. krakṛtavarasaṃkṣan[bhubṛti] santaḥ śrīśivaśśara? (gap due to damaged folio.)

extent.measure: 1 blank folio, 2 guard folio. 126 written folio.

supportDesc.condition: Wormholes, broken damaged folio with some oil stains at some places. Folio numbers and marginal information such as benediction etc is lost. Very difficult to read due the delicate situation of the manuscript.

handNote.desc: Good hand writing but some clusters are illegible.

encodingDesc.p: Square brackets are used to show supplied folio number and inferred words.Question mark is used to show doubtful reading.

TEI.text:
[1v]1 [nibdo]masya?mukhya[ni]rūpyate . kṛt? saṃkalpa[ka?] … (rest of the folio is torned.)
[xr] 8 mahāvṛtasya hotṛmaitrāva[rūṇa] (gap of approximately 12 syllables due to broken folio.) bhyo namaḥ .. śiva?namaḥ .. krakṛtavarasaṃkṣan[bhubṛti] santaḥ śrīśivaśśara? (gap due to damaged folio.)
